name: collections
description: Allows creation of installation of mod packs (meta mods that install a bunch of other mods)
author: Black Tree Gaming Ltd.

scripts.copy_assets: copyfiles -f src/language.json dist && copyfiles -f src/icons.svg dist && copyfiles -f src/collectionicon.svg dist && copyfiles -f style.scss dist && copyfiles -f src/assets/fallback_tile.png dist
scripts.build: npm run webpack && npm run copy_assets && npm run copy_7z && extractInfo
